definition: To immerse oneself in water for cleansing, relaxation, or recreation.
examples: I want to go swimming today.
We like to swim in the lake.
Baden ist gut für die Gesundheit.
Swimming is good for your health.
Im Sommer baden wir oft im Pool.
In summer, we often swim in the pool.
Er badet jeden Morgen im Meer.
He swims in the sea every morning.
